subject: Re: [junit] testing generated file by a template engine
msgSnippet: For me, I just output the generated HTML to String: final StringWriter writer = new StringWriter(); getTemplate().merge(getContext(), writer); final
messageBody:
For me, I just output the generated HTML to String:

final StringWriter writer = new StringWriter();
getTemplate().merge(getContext(), writer);
final ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
final Tidy tidy = new Tidy();
tidy.setXHTML(true);
tidy.parse(new ByteArrayInputStream(writer.toString().getBytes()), out);
assertTrue(out.toString(), "xyz");

This work for me, anyone have better solution?

> Hi all,
